### Chart 1
    
```{r}
library(highcharter)
library(tibble)
data <- tibble(label = c("R", "Matlab", "Python"), data = c(0.5, 0.3, 0.2))

 highchart() %>% 
 hc_chart(type = "pie") %>% 
 hc_add_series_labels_values(labels = data$label, values = data$data)

```
